trigger.expression: {Template App Nginx:nginx[200].change()}<({Template App Nginx:nginx[200].avg(5m)}*0.4*-1) and {Template App Nginx:nginx[rps].avg(5m)}>10
trigger.name: Nginx response 200 (OK) rapid drop
trigger.description: Too fast change in number of response codes change = {nginx[200].change()}

trigger.expression: {Template App Nginx:nginx[302].change()}<({Template App Nginx:nginx[302].avg(5m)}*0.4*-1) and {Template App Nginx:nginx[rps].avg(5m)}>10
trigger.name: Nginx response 302 (REDIRECT) rapid drop
trigger.description: Too fast change in number of respones change = {nginx[302].change()}

trigger.expression: {Template App Nginx:nginx[403].avg(5m)}>{Template App Nginx:nginx[200].avg(60m,5m)} and {Template App Nginx:nginx[rps].avg(5m)}>10
trigger.name: Nginx response 403 (Forbidden) too high

trigger.expression: {Template App Nginx:nginx[499].avg(5m)}>({Template App Nginx:nginx[200].avg(5m)}*0.1) and {Template App Nginx:nginx[200].avg(5m)}>100
trigger.name: Nginx response 499 too high

trigger.expression: ( {Template App Nginx:nginx[500].avg(5m)}>({Template App Nginx:nginx[200].avg(5m)}*0.1) or {Template App Nginx:nginx[502].avg(5m)}>({Template App Nginx:nginx[200].avg(5m)}*0.1) ) and {Template App Nginx:nginx[200].avg(5m)}>100
trigger.name: Number of error codes 50x too high
